title: Omnicom Group 's revenue 2006 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2009.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2009 to 2006.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
gold: This statistic presents the global revenue of U.S. advertising network Omnicom from 2006 to 2018 . In 2018 , the Omnicom Group generated a global revenue of 15.29 billion U.S. dollars , slight increase from 15.27 billion a year earlier . Here you can find out which of Omnicom 's operating sectors generates the most revenue .
